title: Add React testing to CI pipeline
description: Integrate React testing into the continuous integration pipeline. Configure automated test execution, coverage reporting, and quality gates for React components in TM_WEB.

comments.text: Started working on React testing integration.
Added React testing dependencies, jest config, and sample test. Updated workflow to run React tests and added coverage directory to gitignore.
Ruff, mypy, and pytest pass locally. React tests fail locally due to missing npm dependencies.
Split React tests into a separate CI job that runs only when react-dashboard files change.
